bibl.title: Trade Associations in Roman Egypt: their raison d'être. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Aspects of this paper have been drawn from a doctoral thesis (Oxford, 2008) Professional and Trade Associations in Ptolemaic and Roman Egypt. - The satisfaction of professional interests, commensality, and religiosity all appear to have played a role in the reasons behind collective life in the trade associations of Roman Egypt.
bibl.seg: Gibbs Matthew, Trade Associations in Roman Egypt: their raison d'être. Avec résumé en anglais.

Aspects of this paper have been drawn from a doctoral thesis (Oxford, 2008) Professional and Trade Associations in Ptolemaic and Roman Egypt. - The satisfaction of professional interests, commensality, and religiosity all appear to have played a role in the reasons behind collective life in the trade associations of Roman Egypt.
